detailsData.title: Experienced Litigator
detailsData.content: David Hawkins has nearly 15 years of experience representing clients ranging from major corporations to family businesses. His significant courtroom experience includes jury trials, bench trials, injunction hearings, and pretrial proceedings.

detailsData.title: Eminent Domain Expertise
detailsData.content: The firm focuses on representing landowners whose property is threatened by governmental entities and utility companies. They handle both total and partial takings of all types of property, including retail, commercial, industrial, residential, and raw land.

detailsData.title: Recognition and Awards
detailsData.content: David Hawkins has been recognized by Euromoney’s Benchmark Litigation and Washington Business Journal. He was also named 'Young Lawyer of the Year' by the Bar Association of the District of Columbia in 2009.

detailsData.title: Community Leadership
detailsData.content: David served as the 126th President of the Bar Association of the District of Columbia. He regularly teaches continuing legal education courses for other lawyers in the areas of trial advocacy and eminent domain law.

address: 2101 L Street, NW, Suite 300, Washington, DC 20037
valueProp: The Hawkins Law Firm represents DC, Maryland, and Virginia clients in eminent domain litigation and other complex commercial litigation. The firm supports landowners navigating the legal challenges associated with all types of takings by governmental entities and utility companies.
